Thanks for signing up.

Give the little mice who deliver email messages around the web a few minutes, then check your email. Once you confirm your subscription, you'll receive the ARMCHAIR DETECTIVES BUREAU test.

Just read the story and consider the clues before submitting your answer!

And next Sunday morning, usually about 9 a.m. your local time, you'll get the weekly CaseFiles digest email with a list of new stories and all the goodies I promised.

And while you wait,
why not check out …


  • MURDERWIKI to learn more about the murder mystery genre.
  • SHORT STORIES to read if you've just got a little time to kill!
  • NOVELLAS for that leisurly afternoon read.
  • NOVELS and enjoy a long, edge-of-your-seat thrill!
